rules_text:
Reach, trample
If a +1/+1 counter would be put on another creature you control, instead put a +1/+1 counter on that creature and on Avatar of the Natural.
notes:
HQMSEM — 1) At least Enduring Scalelord needs two 6cmc creatures before going infinite. 2) This isn't a may effect, If you get two into play, the trigger one of them, the game ends in a draw.
RESPONSE — this is a clunky af fix... but at least it's a fix?
